articles.title: Defiant Trump Pleads Not Guilty In New York Court In Hush Money Case - NDTV
articles.description: Donald Trump on Tuesday pleaded not guilty to 34 felony counts inside a packed New York courtroom ahead of a trial that could begin as soon as January, as he became the first American president to be arrested on criminal charges.
articles.content:
"Not guilty," Drump Trump said in a clear voice inside the courtroom.

articles.title: NASA names woman, black astronauts for new mission - The Jakarta Post
